DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether TUG device safe effective patient primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety Efficacy TUG ( Therapeutic Ultrasound Glaucoma ) Treatment Primary Open Angle Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Diagnosis primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension eye Be willing discontinue disallow product and/or medication period indicate prior participation throughout study Be willing provide write informed consent Be willing able follow instruction A negative urine pregnancy test agree acceptable form contraception duration study ( female childbearing potential ) Any form glaucoma primary open angle glaucoma ocular hypertension either eye Prior anticipate concurrent use investigational drug device Be currently pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy ; woman positive pregnancy test Have condition ( ocular systemic ) situation , Investigator 's opinion , may put subject increase risk , may confound study data , may interfere significantly subject 's study participation
